title: Sherman signs with Bucs, Cowboys expectations rising, Steelers and Seahawks panic, and Rookie QB's struggling
itunes:title: Sherman signs with Bucs, Cowboys expectations rising, Steelers and Seahawks panic, and Rookie QB's struggling
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Golden Tate explore how good this Cowboys team can be. Were expectations for this rookie class of QB's too high? It might be time for several NFL teams to hit the panic button. Plus, Tom Brady returns to Foxborough on Sunday and will bring Richard Sherman with him as the cornerback signs with the Buccaneers.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
